name: Orange Knight
description:
this game is a short 2d platformer i made in 2-3 months and after a week of trying to fix an error i scrapped the project and released it here.

note: i forgot to make an exit script, to exit this game simply press alt+f4

note2: if you're wondering where the name comes from, i planned to make an orange character but forgot to make it and instead tried to make the scripts first

note3: to run the game simply open the zip file that you had downloaded and run an application named "My project.exe" and the game will launch in a few seconds

note4: sorry for the bad grammar if there is any

and btw theres a little suprise for you at the end of the level!
